gw.api.system

Class ABConfigParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.system.ABConfigParameters

  • public class ABConfigParameters
extends Object
    Guidewire Software Copyright (c) 2004

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ListParameterKey AdditionalPrimaryABContactSearchCriteria
      Names (comma separated) of fields to add to the list of primary search criteria. I.e. fields on ABContactSearchCriteria that would be searchable even without specifying any other criterion. Remember to add the appropriate indexes to the ABContact table, and to update the MinimumSearchCriteria display properties
      static Map<String,ParameterKey<Object>> AllKeys
      a map of all parameters keys defined in the product. Platform config keys should be fetched using PLConfigParameters.getAllKeys()
      static DateTimeParameterKey DuplicateContactsEarliestModificationDate
      The duplicate contacts batch process acts on contacts created or modified after the last time it was run AND after the date specified by this parameter. This makes it possible to avoid processing every contact in the database the first time the batch process run. For example, if contacts are imported into the database on 8/21/2011 and this parameter is set to "08/22/2011 12:00 AM", those contacts will not be processed by the batch process unless they're later modified. Expected format: mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm am
      static BooleanParameterKey DuplicateContactsWideSearch
      Indicates whether the search for duplicate contacts should widen and not use subtype specific logic. Defaults to true.
      static StringParameterKey GOSU_SAMPLE_DATA_METHOD
      Token for the gosu method to invoke for importing sample data
      static StringParameterKey GosuSampleDataMethod
      Token for the gosu method to invoke for importing sample data
      static IntegerParameterKey MaxContactSearchResults
      The max number of contact search results to display in the UI
      static IntegerParameterKey MaxDuplicateContactsFinderWorkQueueResults
      The max number of duplicate contacts to be registered as duplicates by the {@link com.guidewire.ab.domain.contact.DuplicateContactsFinderWorkQueue}. If more duplicates are found for a given contact the {@link com.guidewire.ab.domain.contact.DuplicateContactsFinderWorkQueue} will not register any of the duplicates for that contact but instead log the ABUID.

    • Field Detail

      • AllKeys

        Map<String,ParameterKey<Object>> AllKeys
        a map of all parameters keys defined in the product. Platform config keys should be fetched using PLConfigParameters.getAllKeys()

      • GosuSampleDataMethod

        StringParameterKey GosuSampleDataMethod
        Token for the gosu method to invoke for importing sample data

      • GOSU_SAMPLE_DATA_METHOD

        StringParameterKey GOSU_SAMPLE_DATA_METHOD
        Token for the gosu method to invoke for importing sample data

      • AdditionalPrimaryABContactSearchCriteria

        ListParameterKey AdditionalPrimaryABContactSearchCriteria
        Names (comma separated) of fields to add to the list of primary search criteria. I.e. fields on ABContactSearchCriteria that would be searchable even without specifying any other criterion. Remember to add the appropriate indexes to the ABContact table, and to update the MinimumSearchCriteria display properties

      • MaxContactSearchResults

        IntegerParameterKey MaxContactSearchResults
        The max number of contact search results to display in the UI

      • MaxDuplicateContactsFinderWorkQueueResults

        IntegerParameterKey MaxDuplicateContactsFinderWorkQueueResults
        The max number of duplicate contacts to be registered as duplicates by the {@link com.guidewire.ab.domain.contact.DuplicateContactsFinderWorkQueue}. If more duplicates are found for a given contact the {@link com.guidewire.ab.domain.contact.DuplicateContactsFinderWorkQueue} will not register any of the duplicates for that contact but instead log the ABUID.

      • DuplicateContactsEarliestModificationDate

        DateTimeParameterKey DuplicateContactsEarliestModificationDate
        The duplicate contacts batch process acts on contacts created or modified after the last time it was run AND after the date specified by this parameter. This makes it possible to avoid processing every contact in the database the first time the batch process run. For example, if contacts are imported into the database on 8/21/2011 and this parameter is set to "08/22/2011 12:00 AM", those contacts will not be processed by the batch process unless they're later modified. Expected format: mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm am

      • DuplicateContactsWideSearch

        BooleanParameterKey DuplicateContactsWideSearch
        Indicates whether the search for duplicate contacts should widen and not use subtype specific logic. Defaults to true.
